page.title: 05AT WORK IN MOFFAT
page.content: Tourism is the main industry providing employment for many inhabitants of Moffat.Some of these work in hotels and boarding houses whilst others are sales assistants in mill shops selling a variety of garments to coach loads of tourists of many nationalities including Americans,British,Australians, Dutch, and Germans.During the summer months Moffat mills employ about 120 people,while in the winter months it is about half of this number. Other sources of employment in Moffat are the farming and forestry industries.Moffat's seven farms employ people during the winter and more in the lambing and shearing seasons.The Economic Forestry and the Forestry Commission are major employers of labour in the forests around the town, having offices in it,or nearby.
